name: intl-format-cache
description: A memoizer factory for Intl format constructors.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test: TS_NODE_PROJECT='tests/tsconfig.json' mocha -r ts-node/register -r source-map-support/register -r chai/register-expect tests/index.ts --reporter spec

author: Eric Ferraiuolo <eferraiuolo@gmail.com>
